def_cn: （一些法律体系中被告承认有罪以减轻刑罚的）认罪辩诉协议
def_en: In some legal systems, a plea bargain is an agreement that, if an accused person says they are guilty, they will be charged with a less serious crime or will receive a less severe punishment.

def_cn: （被告）接受认罪辩诉协议
def_en: If an accused person plea bargains, they accept a plea bargain.
